name: Indices of the even terms in the sequence of cubefree numbers.
comment: The asymptotic density of this sequence is 3/7.

In general, the asymptotic density of the indices of the even terms in the sequence of k-free numbers (numbers that are not divisible by a k-th power other than 1), for k >= 2, is (2^(k-1)-1)/(2^k-1).
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: list(lim) = {my(c = 0); for(k = 1, lim, if(iscubefree(k), c++; if(!(k % 2), print1(c, ", ")))); }
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 12 2025

name: Exponent of the highest power of 2 dividing the n-th cubefree number.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 12 2025

name: Indices of the even terms in the sequence of squarefree numbers.
comment: The asymptotic density of this sequence is 1/3.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
program: (PARI) list(lim) = {my(c = 0); for(k = 1, lim, if(issquarefree(k), c++; if(!(k % 2), print1(c, ", "))));}
author: _Amiram Eldar_, Apr 12 2025
